title: League Art Commissions
body:
I am looking for someone to help me out and create a 1200 x 380 image of Camille, Darius, Gnar & Jax. Those are my 4 favorite champs and I would like someone's help in finding the right artist to create my dream image. Thank you for all referrals and hopefully I can find my creator :)

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: AH thank you Reisen! still new to the art stuff. i did a temporary banner, but i'd much prefer to pay someone to make a quality image.

> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=tEu747zk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-18T22:26:24.114+0000)
>
> why so low  res

Well the upload image said to be 1200 x 380 for the banner on twitch, should i request for higher res and then rescale?
That is a yes. If you start it on the require res and have to make it smaller for whatever reason, it'll pixallize the image entirely.
